"Hello?!<br>Can anyone read me?!": "This is Aelio Training Team Squad 1!"
"Aina?!"
"Tell me you're okay!"

"That voice...!
You came out here?!"

"Listen!
We're all okay."

"However, we're currently immobilized,
and surrounded by enemies."
"ガヤ：アイナ隊モブアークス①"
"T-This was supposed to just<be>be a walk to Retem..."
"Wasn't this the safe route?!"

"Didn't this all start because
YOU decided to attack that enemy?"

"Gimme a break! How was I supposed to know
they were going to be that strong?!"
"I could handle them just fine when we were training..."
"ガヤ：アイナ隊モブアークス②"
"We'll be alright."

"Listen up everyone.
We are going to make it back to Aelio."

"I've experienced countless
battles like this before."

"I might not be on the same level as
Crawford or Bruder, but still..."
"I've learned from them."

"I've learned that no matter how dire the situation is,
there is always a way to prevail."
"...And... what way is that?"
"The power of each and every member of ARKS."
"We prevail by mobilizing all of this power at once."

"By trusting in our comrades, and acting as
one single unit, we can find a way forward."
"Ms. Aina..."

"Alright!
Grab your weapons!"

"We've got a super powerful
ally on their way to come help us."

"Until they get here, I'd like to avoid combat as much as possible,
but if we get spotted by enemies, we fight them head on. Got that?"

"You'll be alright.
Just remember what I've taught you."
"If you really put it into practice, you'll do just fine."
"R-Right!"

"Believe in the power of the bond
we've all forged together so far!"
"The power of our bond..."
"ガヤ：アイナ隊モブアークス③"
"Heard all that, <%me>?"
"We'll hang in here as best we can."
"So come over here quickly and help us out!"
"On my way!"
"Hang in there!"
"Yup! We'll be waiting!"
